content: Turn back on yourself and go back up the stairs and the path. Turn to the right now and grab the Purple Lingzhi by the tree. This will turn into an enemy, but once you beat it, you'll receive a Purple Lingzhi and Nine-Capped Lingzhi.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Turn back on yourself and go back up the stairs and the path. Turn to the right now and grab the Purple Lingzhi by the tree. This will turn into an enemy, but once you beat it, you'll receive a Purple Lingzhi and Nine-Capped Lingzhi.
